channel.title: [delta] range bug
channel.description: You guys probably knows this when you shoot an arrow and you run away or walk a couple blocks, the arrow should still hit. What it does in my server, it shoots, the arrow gfx goes to the player but doesnt hit when i walk away

when you shoot an arrow and you run away or walk a couple blocks, the arrow should still hit.
